sentences.sentence: The value of America decrease greatly between 2010 and 2014; while Britain keep stable between 2010 and 2014.
The sum value of America and Britain decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2014.

sentences.sentence: The value of America decrease greatly between 2010 and 2014; while Britain keep stable between 2010 and 2014.
The sum value of America and Britain decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2014.
